localize.text: An AI is smarter than regular people.
But there are some things you don't know.
For example, some AI can lie.
If the controller of an AI has given an order not to share specific information.
It will not be obligated to tell the truth to anyone other than the controller.
Some advanced AI may exploit such an order to tell lies.
I've programmed an AI before, as part of a project...
So I know that an AI won't necessarily tell the truth.
In case you question my words.
I will send you a system I developed myself.
This key will lengthen the nose.
This is a test code. It can only be used once.
